title: FAT LEONARD - #4: The Braveheart
description: How Leonard buys his own warship, the Braveheart, complete with a mercenary army, and deploys it to help fight Al Qaeda. He secretly records orgies with Navy officers, causing one of the U.S.’s worst ever national security breaches.
itunes:title: FAT LEONARD: The Braveheart
itunes:subtitle: The U.S. relies on Leonard for secret missions, but is its trust misplaced?
author: podcastsprojectbrazen@gmail.com (Project Brazen Originals)
itunes:author: Project Brazen Originals
